Integrated Therapy Services of WNY

Not all kids develop the same way.
Some need extra help.
That's why we're here.

25 Liberty St, Suite 5

  • About Us

Building each child's future. One block at a time.

ITS of WNY is dedicated to providing high quality therapy and educational services that develop the skills and abilities to enhance the overall development of special-needs children in their home, school, and community.
